channel.title: [PI] Client connection problem [PI]
channel.description:
Whenever I open the client of my server it automatically closes after this error: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1z5nj0o.jpg[/img]
This occurred randomly after working just fine and it affects only some players. But it affects me (the host) and also other players. I'm not sure if this should be server sided because I tried making a new client and the same thing happened, but also, when I tried running an old version of my server, and the error again. Is it my Java or something? Please help!

item.title: [PI] Client connection problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

The host ‘deroshascape.no-ip.biz’ is an unknown host. It probably hasn’t been created yet.
Create it using no-ip.com and if you already did and it’s not working, you need to either portforward (or maybe again) or update your host, they expire.

Read full topic
